Package view

Class BenzoView

java.lang.Object
view.EnemyView
view.BenzoView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class BenzoView extends EnemyView
class that represents the view of the enemy type Benzo an instance of this class will be created to be the observer of a Benzo, for every Benzo
